products.title: Kisan Drone / Agri Drone
products.description: An Agri Drone, also known as an agricultural drone or farm drone, is an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) specifically designed for agricultural applications. These drones are equipped with various sensors, cameras, and other technologies that enable them to collect data and perform tasks related to farming and crop management.

products.title: Surveillance Drone
products.description: A Surveillance Drone, also known as a monitoring or reconnaissance drone, is an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) specifically designed for surveillance and monitoring purposes. These drones are equipped with advanced technologies that enable them to gather real-time visual and data intelligence from the air.

products.title: Mapping & Survey Drone
products.description: A Mapping & Survey Drone, also known as a surveying drone or an aerial mapping drone, is an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) specifically designed for conducting mapping and surveying tasks. These drones are equipped with advanced sensors and imaging technology that enable them to collect accurate geospatial data from the air.

products.title: Surya Solar Panel Cleaning Drone
products.description: A Solar Panel Cleaning Drone is a specialized unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) designed for the purpose of cleaning solar panels. These drones are equipped with specific features and mechanisms that enable them to efficiently and effectively clean solar panels installed in large-scale solar power plants or residential rooftops.

products.title: Vriksh Vahaan - Seed Dropping Drone
products.description: A Seed Dropping Drone, also known as an agricultural seeding drone or precision seed sower, is an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) designed specifically for the purpose of sowing seeds in agricultural fields or reforestation efforts. These drones are equipped with specialized mechanisms that allow them to accurately and efficiently distribute seeds over large areas.

products.title: Loudspeaker Drone
products.description: In India, law enforcement quickly adopted our drones equipped with loudspeaker systems, drone loud speakers, and drone speakers to remind communities of social distancing standards. These drones, featuring weather-resistant construction, are instrumental in monitoring the implementation of regulations during the COVID-19 pandemic.

products.title: UGV (Unmanned Ground Vehicle)
products.description: Our UGVs, including unmanned ground vehicles, serve multiple civilian roles such as urban search and rescue, firefighting, nuclear plant operations, crowd control, and agricultural spraying. Operating autonomously, these UGV drones navigate complex environments and relay data for remote teleoperation.

products.title: Boat
products.description: The water-cleaning boat project was initiated to aid in the remote navigation of the boat for cleaning ponds and coastal areas. Powered by a motor-driven propeller, the boat moves forward efficiently, gathering debris and pollutants using mesh grippers.

products.title: Submarine
products.description: Introducing our groundbreaking submarine drone, designed for exploration and environmental monitoring. This remote underwater vehicle is equipped with advanced features, including a rotatable wireless camera for remote navigation and exploration.

products.title: Fixed Wing VTOL
products.description: Fixed Wing VTOL (Vertical Takeoff and Landing) drones combine the characteristics of both fixed-wing and multirotor drones, offering vertical takeoff, landing, and horizontal flight for long-range and efficient operations.

products.title: Industry 4.0 Drones
products.description: Industry 4.0 Drones are integrated into the Fourth Industrial Revolution, featuring connectivity, sensor integration, autonomous operation, and AI for smart manufacturing and data exchange.
features: Cloud Integration and Big Data Analytics

products.title: Stringing Drone
products.description: Stringing Drones are designed for the installation and maintenance of power transmission lines. These drones are equipped with heavy payload capacity, autonomous flight, and cable management systems for efficient power line stringing.
